resources.string: Optional: enter a proxy/relay server address. If you enter only a host, KGPT will append the default path for the selected provider (e.g. /v1, /api/v1, /v1beta).
Manage your API keys for each provider
API keys are stored securely on your device and never shared.
Enable in launcher settings to apply Material You colors

Welcome to KGPT! This is your main dashboard.

• Module Status: Shows whether the Xposed module is active. Enable it in LSPosed Manager.

• Current Model: Displays your selected AI model. Tap to change it.

• AI Invocation: Configure commands and patterns to trigger AI.

• How to Use: Learn how to use KGPT effectively.
Keeps your text intact - AI response appears after your text
e.g. Hello, /ask how are you? \u2192 Hello, I\'m fine!
Chose and configure your language model
A new version of KGPT is available.
Add keys for other AI providers
Select an AI provider (auto switches the corresponding key), then choose the model.
API keys are processed locally on your device and never shared.
Are you fully aware of the risks and agree to proceed?

Are you sure you want to delete this custom action? This action cannot be undone.

Quickly open AI chat or copy current input
Enable one or two floating bubbles. Tap AI bubble to open the AI dialog; tap Copy bubble to copy the entire input field.
Enable a fixed floating pad (rectangle). You can adjust its X/Y position and size. Gestures: tap opens AI chat, long press copies the whole input, swipe in 4 directions for quick actions.
Requires overlay permission to display on top of other apps.
Tap: AI chat · Long press: copy input · Swipe: Up=menu, Down=settings, Left=commands, Right=triggers
Tap to open an AI prompt dialog (commits prompt + trigger into the current input).
Tap to copy the entire current input field.
No app triggers added yet. Tap the button above to add one.
Turn off to temporarily disable all /commands (AI trigger still works).
Turn off to temporarily disable all triggers on this page.
Open apps by typing trigger words
Open apps quickly by typing their trigger word
Quick AI actions on selected text
Quick AI text actions using trigger commands. Type your text, then add the action trigger at the end.

Type the trigger word to open app automatically • Tap app card to edit
Type trigger word to launch apps
Type: "What is the weather?$" • AI will respond
Type your text, then add $ at the end
Usage: text /command + AI trigger symbol e.g. Hello world /short$
Warning: Files with keys are risky to share
What is the capital of France?$
API key is empty. Some endpoints may require a key.
No cached models. Please tap Fetch Models in settings first.
Missing API Key. Please configure your API key in KGPT settings.
Create your own AI text action
Instructions on how the AI should process the text
Edit your custom AI text action
You are a text rephrasing assistant. Rephrase the given text while keeping the exact same meaning. Maintain the same language as the input. Only output the rephrased text, nothing else.

You are a grammar and spelling correction assistant. Fix all grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors in the given text. Maintain the same language and meaning. Only output the corrected text, nothing else.

You are a writing improvement assistant. Improve the style, clarity, and flow of the given text while keeping the same meaning. Maintain the same language. Only output the improved text, nothing else.

You are a text expansion assistant. Expand the given text by adding more details, examples, or explanations while keeping the core meaning. Maintain the same language. Only output the expanded text, nothing else.
You are a text summarization assistant. Shorten the given text while keeping the essential meaning and key points. Maintain the same language. Only output the shortened text, nothing else.
You are a tone adjustment assistant. Convert the given text to a formal, professional tone. Maintain the same language and meaning. Only output the formal version, nothing else.
You are a tone adjustment assistant. Convert the given text to a casual, friendly tone. Maintain the same language and meaning. Only output the casual version, nothing else.

You are a translation assistant. Detect the language of the input text and translate it to the opposite language (if Arabic, translate to English; if English, translate to Arabic; for other languages, translate to English). Only output the translated text, nothing else.
You are a translation assistant. Translate the given text to %1$s. Only output the translated text, nothing else.
A new version of KGPT is available.
Version %1$s is now available.\nYou are currently using v%2$s.
You are running the latest version (v%1$s).\nNo updates are available at this time.

Sorry, we couldn't check for updates right now.

%1$s

Please check your internet connection and try again.
Unable to check for updates.\n\nPlease connect to the internet and try again.

Hey there! I'm the KGPT cat.

If you're enjoying the app, would you mind giving us a star on GitHub?
It really helps!
Type: \"What is the weather?$\" • AI will respond
Add keys for other AI providers
API keys are processed locally on your device and never shared.
Manage your AI commands and triggers

Customize your KGPT experience.

• Dark Mode: Enable dark theme for comfortable viewing at night.

• AMOLED Dark: Pure black theme for OLED screens to save battery.

• Enable Logging: Turn on logs for debugging. Disable for better performance.

• External Internet Service: Recommended for chat completion. Enables external network requests for AI responses.
Logging is currently disabled. You need to enable it to export logs.
Logging enabled. You can now export logs.
Type text then add %1$s at end
Type text then add %1$s to search
Added Google AI Mode to web search options
Added language selection feature with support for all available languages
Improved screen layouts for one-handed use and larger fingers
Fixed many stability issues and improved performance
Tested and added support for FUTO keyboard
Fixed connection issue with Chutes API
Added new Perplexity model and Perplexity API support
Please be patient as more issues have been reported to the developer, but they will be resolved in batches of updates as this is a one-person project. Thank you for your understanding.
Fixed app crash when changing language and attempting to enter AI Invocation section
Improved design of the alert appearance in the in-app changelog
Added support for GLM models provided by ZhipuAI
Fixed missing space issue when using text formatting commands
Fixed the issue where text disappears when using an unregistered trigger or receiving no response from AI
Please be patient as more issues have been reported to the developer, but they will be resolved in batches of updates as this is a one-person project. Thank you for your understanding.
No response received. The AI returned empty content.\nHint: You might be using an unregistered trigger/command.
Root access denied - some logs may be limited
No restorable data found in backup

This symbol is already used by another pattern

The model "%1$s" is not in our verified list.
It might be new or incorrect.

Did you mean: %2$s?

Enter relay/proxy server address (Base URL). You can leave it empty to use the default.
Claude does not support fetching model list
以下是（快捷跳转）的设置，😁是占位符，多个用##隔开。用途：一步直达应用搜索东西。URL 模板可用 {q} / %s / 😁 代表查询内容；也可以只写前缀（如 https://www.google.com/search?q=），程序会自动在末尾追加搜索内容。
URL 模板（{q} / %s / 😁 代表查询内容；也可只写前缀）
请输入关键词后再打开
没有应用可以打开此链接
提示：可用 {q} / %s / 😁 作为查询内容占位符；也可以只写前缀（如 https://www.google.com/search?q=），程序会自动在末尾追加搜索内容。示例：https://www.google.com/search?q={q}
暂无快捷跳转，点“添加”创建。
确定删除这条快捷跳转？
Tap the pencil to rename. Drag the right handle to reorder. Tap the trash to delete.
Delete group “%1$s”? Clipboard items in this group will be moved to “All”.
Translate the following text. Give only the translation.
Fix spelling and grammar errors. Give only the corrected text.
Summarize the following text in one or two sentences.
Rewrite in a formal and professional style. Output only the rewritten text.
Rewrite in a friendly and casual style. Output only the rewritten text.
Write a short and appropriate reply. Output only the reply.
Write a professional email about the following topic.
Explain the following topic in simple terms.
Write code as requested. Output code only.
Add appropriate emojis. Output only the text with emojis.
Are you sure you want to delete /%1$s?
